name: TAIDOOR RAT DLL Load
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Chinese TAIDOOR RAT malware load
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*dll,MyStart* OR *dll\ MyStart*) OR (process.command_line:*\ MyStart AND process.command_line:*rundll32.exe*))`
